Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueI.label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments, Due in Four Years
OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueI.description: Amount of required minimum rental payments for operating leases having an initial or remaining non-cancelable lease term in excess of one year due in the fourth fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueI.label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments, Due in Three Years
OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueI.description: Amount of required minimum rental payments for operating leases having an initial or remaining non-cancelable lease term in excess of one year due in the third fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueI.label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments, Due in Two Years
OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueI.description: Amount of required minimum rental payments for operating leases having an initial or remaining non-cancelable lease term in excess of one year due in the second fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueT.label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments, Due Thereafter
OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueT.description: Amount of required minimum rental payments for operating leases having an initial or remaining non-cancelable lease term in excess of one year due after the fifth fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsRema.label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments, Remainder of Fiscal Year
OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsRema.description: Amount of required minimum rental payments for operating leases having an initial or remaining non-cancelable lease term in excess of one year due in the remainder of the fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

OtherAccruedLiabilitiesCurrent.label: Other Accrued Liabilities, Current
OtherAccruedLiabilitiesCurrent.description: Amount of expenses incurred but not yet paid classified as other, due within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

OtherAdjustmentsToIncomeDiscontinuedOper.label: Other Adjustments to Income, Discontinued Operations
OtherAdjustmentsToIncomeDiscontinuedOper.description: Amount of noncash income (expense), classified as other, from discontinued operations.

OtherAssetsCurrent.label: Other Assets, Current
OtherAssetsCurrent.description: Amount of current assets classified as other.

OtherAssetsMiscellaneousNoncurrent.label: Other Assets, Miscellaneous, Noncurrent
OtherAssetsMiscellaneousNoncurrent.description: Amount of other miscellaneous assets expected to be realized or consumed after one year or normal operating cycle, if longer.

OtherAssetsNoncurrent.label: Other Assets, Noncurrent
OtherAssetsNoncurrent.description: Amount of noncurrent assets classified as other.

OtherCommitmentDueAfterFifthYear.label: Other Commitment, to be Paid, after Year Five
OtherCommitmentDueAfterFifthYear.description: Amount of commitment classified as other to be paid after fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

OtherCommitmentDueInFifthYear.label: Other Commitment, to be Paid, Year Five
OtherCommitmentDueInFifthYear.description: Amount of commitment classified as other to be paid in fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

OtherCommitmentDueInFourthYear.label: Other Commitment, to be Paid, Year Four
OtherCommitmentDueInFourthYear.description: Amount of commitment classified as other to be paid in fourth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

OtherCommitmentDueInNextTwelveMonths.label: Other Commitment, to be Paid, Year One
OtherCommitmentDueInNextTwelveMonths.description: Amount of commitment classified as other to be paid in next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

OtherCommitmentDueInSecondYear.label: Other Commitment, to be Paid, Year Two
OtherCommitmentDueInSecondYear.description: Amount of commitment classified as other to be paid in second fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

OtherCommitmentDueInThirdYear.label: Other Commitment, to be Paid, Year Three
OtherCommitmentDueInThirdYear.description: Amount of commitment classified as other to be paid in third fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

OtherLiabilitiesNoncurrent.label: Other Liabilities, Noncurrent
OtherLiabilitiesNoncurrent.description: Amount of liabilities classified as other, due after one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

OtherLongTermDebt.label: Other Long-term Debt
OtherLongTermDebt.description: Amount of long-term debt classified as other.

OtherNoncashIncomeExpense.label: Other Noncash Income (Expense)
OtherNoncashIncomeExpense.description: Amount of income (expense) included in net income that results in no cash inflow (outflow), classified as other.

OtherNonoperatingIncomeExpense.label: Other Nonoperating Income (Expense)
OtherNonoperatingIncomeExpense.description: Amount of income (expense) related to nonoperating activities, classified as other.

OtherPaymentsToAcquireBusinesses.label: Other Payments to Acquire Businesses
OtherPaymentsToAcquireBusinesses.description: The cash outflow associated with other payments to acquire businesses including deposit on pending acquisitions and preacquisition costs.

OtherSalesRevenueNet.label: Other Revenue, Net (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
OtherSalesRevenueNet.description: Amount, after sales adjustments, returns, allowances, and discounts, of revenue classified as other.

PaidInKindInterest.label: Paid-in-Kind Interest
PaidInKindInterest.description: Interest paid other than in cash for example by issuing additional debt securities. As a noncash item, it is added to net income when calculating cash provided by or used in operations using the indirect method.

PartnersCapital.label: Partners' Capital
PartnersCapital.description: The amount of ownership interest of different classes of partners in limited partnership.

PartnersCapitalAccountAcquisitions.label: Partners' Capital Account, Acquisitions
PartnersCapitalAccountAcquisitions.description: Change in the different classes of partners' capital accounts during the year due to acquisitions. Partners include general, limited and preferred partners.

PartnersCapitalAccountContributions.label: Partners' Capital Account, Contributions
PartnersCapitalAccountContributions.description: Total contributions made by each class of partners (i.e., general, limited and preferred partners).

PartnersCapitalAccountDistributions.label: Partners' Capital Account, Distributions
PartnersCapitalAccountDistributions.description: Total distributions to each class of partners (i.e., general, limited and preferred partners).

PartnersCapitalAccountExchangesAndConver.label: Partners' Capital Account, Exchanges and Conversions
PartnersCapitalAccountExchangesAndConver.description: Total change in each class of partners' capital accounts during the year due to exchanges and conversions. Partners include general, limited and preferred partners.

PartnersCapitalAccountPrivatePlacementOf.label: Partners' Capital Account, Private Placement of Units
PartnersCapitalAccountPrivatePlacementOf.description: Monetary value of the issuance of new units of limited partnership interest in a private placement.

PartnersCapitalAccountPublicSaleOfUnits.label: Partners' Capital Account, Public Sale of Units
PartnersCapitalAccountPublicSaleOfUnits.description: Monetary value of the issuance of new units of limited partnership interest in a public offering.

PartnersCapitalAccountPublicSaleOfUnitsN.label: Partners' Capital Account, Public Sale of Units Net of Offering Costs
PartnersCapitalAccountPublicSaleOfUnitsN.description: Monetary value of the issuance of new units of limited partnership interest in a public offering, net of offering costs. This is a parenthetical disclosure.

PartnersCapitalAccountRedemptions.label: Partners' Capital Account, Redemptions
PartnersCapitalAccountRedemptions.description: Total change in each class of partners' capital accounts during the year due to redemptions and adjustments to redemption value. All partners include general, limited and preferred partners.

PartnersCapitalAccountSaleOfUnits.label: Partners' Capital Account, Sale of Units
PartnersCapitalAccountSaleOfUnits.description: Total change in each class of partners' capital accounts during the year due to the sale of units. All partners include general, limited and preferred partners.

PartnersCapitalAccountUnitBasedCompensat.label: Partners' Capital Account, Unit-based Payment Arrangement, Amount
PartnersCapitalAccountUnitBasedCompensat.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in partners' capital account for unit-based payment arrangement issued by partnership. Partner includes, but is not limited to, general, limited and preferred partners.

PartnersCapitalAccountUnitsSoldInPublicO.label: Partners' Capital Account, Units, Sold in Public Offering
PartnersCapitalAccountUnitsSoldInPublicO.description: The number of units sold in a public offering of each class of partners' capital account. Units represent shares of ownership of the general, limited, and preferred partners.

PartnersCapitalOther.label: Partners' Capital, Other
PartnersCapitalOther.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in partners' capital classified as other.

PaymentOfFinancingAndStockIssuanceCosts.label: Payment of Financing and Stock Issuance Costs
PaymentOfFinancingAndStockIssuanceCosts.description: The total of the cash outflow during the period which has been paid to third parties in connection with debt origination, which will be amortized over the remaining maturity period of the associated long-term debt and the cost incurred directly for the issuance of equity securities.

PaymentsForProceedsFromOtherInvestingAct.label: Payments for (Proceeds from) Other Investing Activities
PaymentsForProceedsFromOtherInvestingAct.description: Amount of cash (inflow) outflow from investing activities classified as other.

PaymentsForProceedsFromProductiveAssets.label: Payments for (Proceeds from) Productive Assets
PaymentsForProceedsFromProductiveAssets.description: The net cash outflow or inflow from purchases, sales and disposals of property, plant and equipment and other productive assets, including intangibles.

PaymentsOfCapitalDistribution.label: Payments of Capital Distribution
PaymentsOfCapitalDistribution.description: Cash outflow to owners or shareholders, excluding ordinary dividends. Includes special dividends.

PaymentsOfDistributionsToAffiliates.label: Payments of Distributions to Affiliates
PaymentsOfDistributionsToAffiliates.description: The distributions of earnings to an entity that is affiliated with the reporting entity by means of direct or indirect ownership.

PaymentsOfDividends.label: Payments of Dividends
PaymentsOfDividends.description: Cash outflow in the form of capital distributions and dividends to common shareholders, preferred shareholders and noncontrolling interests.

PaymentsOfFinancingCosts.label: Payments of Financing Costs
PaymentsOfFinancingCosts.description: The cash outflow for loan and debt issuance costs.

PaymentsOfStockIssuanceCosts.label: Payments of Stock Issuance Costs
PaymentsOfStockIssuanceCosts.description: The cash outflow for cost incurred directly with the issuance of an equity security.

PaymentsToAcquireBusinessesNetOfCashAcqu.label: Payments to Acquire Businesses, Net of Cash Acquired
PaymentsToAcquireBusinessesNetOfCashAcqu.description: The cash outflow associated with the acquisition of a business, net of the cash acquired from the purchase.

PaymentsToAcquireMiningAssets.label: Payments to Acquire Mining Assets
PaymentsToAcquireMiningAssets.description: The cash outflow from the purchase of mining and mining related assets during the period.

PaymentsToAcquireProductiveAssets.label: Payments to Acquire Productive Assets
PaymentsToAcquireProductiveAssets.description: The cash outflow for purchases of and capital improvements on property, plant and equipment (capital expenditures), software, and other intangible assets.

PrepaidExpenseAndOtherAssetsCurrent.label: Prepaid Expense and Other Assets, Current
PrepaidExpenseAndOtherAssetsCurrent.description: Amount of asset related to consideration paid in advance for costs that provide economic benefits in future periods, and amount of other assets that are expected to be realized or consumed within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

PrepaidInsurance.label: Prepaid Insurance
PrepaidInsurance.description: Amount of asset related to consideration paid in advance for insurance that provides economic benefits within a future period of one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

ProceedsFromCollectionOfNotesReceivable.label: Proceeds from Collection of Notes Receivable
ProceedsFromCollectionOfNotesReceivable.description: The cash inflow associated with principal collections from a borrowing supported by a written promise to pay an obligation.

ProceedsFromDivestitureOfBusinesses.label: Proceeds from Divestiture of Businesses
ProceedsFromDivestitureOfBusinesses.description: The cash inflow associated with the amount received from the sale of a portion of the company's business, for example a segment, division, branch or other business, during the period.

ProceedsFromIssuanceOfCommonLimitedPartn.label: Proceeds from Issuance of Common Limited Partners Units
ProceedsFromIssuanceOfCommonLimitedPartn.description: The cash inflow from the issuance of common limited partners units during the period.

ProceedsFromIssuanceOfCommonStock.label: Proceeds from Issuance of Common Stock
ProceedsFromIssuanceOfCommonStock.description: The cash inflow from the additional capital contribution to the entity.

ProceedsFromIssuanceOfLongTermDebt.label: Proceeds from Issuance of Long-term Debt
ProceedsFromIssuanceOfLongTermDebt.description: The cash inflow from a debt initially having maturity due after one year or beyond the operating cycle, if longer.

ProceedsFromIssuanceOfOtherLongTermDebt.label: Proceeds from Issuance of Other Long-term Debt
ProceedsFromIssuanceOfOtherLongTermDebt.description: Amount of cash inflow from issuance of long-term debt classified as other.

ProceedsFromIssuanceOfPrivatePlacement.label: Proceeds from Issuance of Private Placement
ProceedsFromIssuanceOfPrivatePlacement.description: The cash inflow associated with the amount received from entity's raising of capital via private rather than public placement.

ProceedsFromIssuanceOfSubordinatedLongTe.label: Proceeds from Issuance of Subordinated Long-term Debt
ProceedsFromIssuanceOfSubordinatedLongTe.description: The cash inflow from a borrowing where a lender is placed in a lien position behind debt having a higher priority of repayment (senior) in liquidation of the entity's assets or underlying collateral.

ProceedsFromLongTermCapitalLeaseObligati.label: Proceeds from Long-term Capital Lease Obligations
ProceedsFromLongTermCapitalLeaseObligati.description: The cash inflow from proceeds received from lessor related to a long-term capital lease obligation.

ProceedsFromLongTermLinesOfCredit.label: Proceeds from Long-term Lines of Credit
ProceedsFromLongTermLinesOfCredit.description: The cash inflow from a contractual arrangement with the lender, including letter of credit, standby letter of credit and revolving credit arrangements, under which borrowings can be made up to a specific amount at any point in time with maturities due beyond one year or the operating cycle, if longer.

ProceedsFromPartnershipContribution.label: Proceeds from Partnership Contribution
ProceedsFromPartnershipContribution.description: The cash inflow from the capital received in cash from a partner in a partnership during the period.

ProceedsFromPaymentsForOtherFinancingAct.label: Proceeds from (Payments for) Other Financing Activities
ProceedsFromPaymentsForOtherFinancingAct.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from financing activities classified as other.

ProceedsFromSaleOfProductiveAssets.label: Proceeds from Sale of Productive Assets
ProceedsFromSaleOfProductiveAssets.description: The cash inflow from the sale of property, plant and equipment (capital expenditures), software, and other intangible assets.

ProceedsFromSaleOfPropertyPlantAndEquipm.label: Proceeds from Sale of Property, Plant, and Equipment
ProceedsFromSaleOfPropertyPlantAndEquipm.description: The cash inflow from the sale of long-lived, physical assets that are used in the normal conduct of business to produce goods and services and not intended for resale.

PropertyPlantAndEquipmentAdditions.label: Property, Plant and Equipment, Additions
PropertyPlantAndEquipmentAdditions.description: Amount of acquisition of long-lived, physical assets used in the normal conduct of business and not intended for resale. Examples include, but are not limited to, land, buildings, machinery and equipment, office equipment, furniture and fixtures, and computer equipment.

PropertyPlantAndEquipmentGross.label: Property, Plant and Equipment, Gross
PropertyPlantAndEquipmentGross.description: Amount before accumulated depreciation, depletion and amortization of physical assets used in the normal conduct of business and not intended for resale. Examples include, but are not limited to, land, buildings, machinery and equipment, office equipment, and furniture and fixtures.

PropertyPlantAndEquipmentNet.label: Property, Plant and Equipment, Net
PropertyPlantAndEquipmentNet.description: Amount after accumulated depreciation, depletion and amortization of physical assets used in the normal conduct of business to produce goods and services and not intended for resale. Examples include, but are not limited to, land, buildings, machinery and equipment, office equipment, and furniture and fixtures.

ProvisionForDoubtfulAccounts.label: Accounts Receivable, Credit Loss Expense (Reversal)
ProvisionForDoubtfulAccounts.description: Amount of expense (reversal of expense) for expected credit loss on accounts receivable.

PurchaseObligation.label: Purchase Obligation
PurchaseObligation.description: Minimum amount of purchase arrangement in which the entity has agreed to expend funds to procure goods or services from a supplier.

PurchaseObligationDueAfterFifthYear.label: Purchase Obligation, to be Paid, after Year Five
PurchaseObligationDueAfterFifthYear.description: Amount of purchase arrangement to be paid after fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Includes, but is not limited to, recorded and unrecorded purchase obligations, long-term purchase commitment, and short-term purchase commitment. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

PurchaseObligationDueInFifthYear.label: Purchase Obligation, to be Paid, Year Five
PurchaseObligationDueInFifthYear.description: Amount of purchase arrangement to be paid in fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Includes, but is not limited to, recorded and unrecorded purchase obligations, long-term purchase commitment, and short-term purchase commitment. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

PurchaseObligationDueInFourthYear.label: Purchase Obligation, to be Paid, Year Four
PurchaseObligationDueInFourthYear.description: Amount of purchase arrangement to be paid in fourth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Includes, but is not limited to, recorded and unrecorded purchase obligations, long-term purchase commitment, and short-term purchase commitment. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

PurchaseObligationDueInNextTwelveMonths.label: Purchase Obligation, to be Paid, Year One
PurchaseObligationDueInNextTwelveMonths.description: Amount of purchase arrangement to be paid in next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Includes, but is not limited to, recorded and unrecorded purchase obligations, long-term purchase commitment, and short-term purchase commitment. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

PurchaseObligationDueInSecondYear.label: Purchase Obligation, to be Paid, Year Two
PurchaseObligationDueInSecondYear.description: Amount of purchase arrangement to be paid in second fiscal year following current fiscal year. Includes, but is not limited to, recorded and unrecorded purchase obligations, long-term purchase commitment, and short-term purchase commitment. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

PurchaseObligationDueInThirdYear.label: Purchase Obligation, to be Paid, Year Three
PurchaseObligationDueInThirdYear.description: Amount of purchase arrangement to be paid in third fiscal year following current fiscal year. Includes, but is not limited to, recorded and unrecorded purchase obligations, long-term purchase commitment, and short-term purchase commitment. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

PurchaseObligationFutureMinimumPaymentsR.label: Purchase Obligation, to be Paid, Remainder of Fiscal Year
PurchaseObligationFutureMinimumPaymentsR.description: Amount of purchase arrangement to be paid in remainder of current fiscal year. Includes, but is not limited to, recorded and unrecorded purchase obligations, long-term purchase commitment, and short-term purchase commitment.

RecordedUnconditionalPurchaseObligationD.label: Recorded Unconditional Purchase Obligation, to be Paid, Remainder of Fiscal Year
RecordedUnconditionalPurchaseObligationD.description: Amount of recorded unconditional purchase obligation to be paid in remainder of current fiscal year.

RelatedPartyTransactionExpensesFromTrans.label: Related Party Transaction, Expenses from Transactions with Related Party
RelatedPartyTransactionExpensesFromTrans.description: Expenses recognized resulting from transactions (excluding transactions that are eliminated in consolidated or combined financial statements) with related party.

RelatedPartyTransactionPurchasesFromRela.label: Related Party Transaction, Purchases from Related Party
RelatedPartyTransactionPurchasesFromRela.description: Purchases during the period (excluding transactions that are eliminated in consolidated or combined financial statements) with related party.

RelatedPartyTransactionSellingGeneralAnd.label: Related Party Transaction, Selling, General and Administrative Expenses from Transactions with Related Party
RelatedPartyTransactionSellingGeneralAnd.description: Amount of selling, general and administrative expenses resulting from transactions, excluding transactions that are eliminated in consolidated or combined financial statements, with related party.

RepaymentsOfLongTermCapitalLeaseObligati.label: Repayments of Long-term Capital Lease Obligations
RepaymentsOfLongTermCapitalLeaseObligati.description: The cash outflow for the obligation for a lease meeting the criteria for capitalization (with maturities exceeding one year or beyond the operating cycle of the entity, if longer).

RepaymentsOfLongTermDebt.label: Repayments of Long-term Debt
RepaymentsOfLongTermDebt.description: The cash outflow for debt initially having maturity due after one year or beyond the normal operating cycle, if longer.

RepaymentsOfLongTermLinesOfCredit.label: Repayments of Long-term Lines of Credit
RepaymentsOfLongTermLinesOfCredit.description: The cash outflow for the settlement of obligation drawn from a contractual arrangement with the lender, including letter of credit, standby letter of credit and revolving credit arrangements, under which borrowings can be made up to a specific amount at any point in time with maturities due beyond one year or the operating cycle, if longer.

RepaymentsOfOtherDebt.label: Repayments of Other Debt
RepaymentsOfOtherDebt.description: Amount of cash outflow for the payment of debt classified as other.

RepaymentsOfOtherLongTermDebt.label: Repayments of Other Long-term Debt
RepaymentsOfOtherLongTermDebt.description: Amount of cash outflow for the payment of debt classified as other, maturing after one year or the operating cycle, if longer.

RepaymentsOfRelatedPartyDebt.label: Repayments of Related Party Debt
RepaymentsOfRelatedPartyDebt.description: The cash outflow for the payment of a long-term borrowing made from a related party where one party can exercise control or significant influence over another party; including affiliates, owners or officers and their immediate families, pension trusts, and so forth. Alternate caption: Payments for Advances from Affiliates.

RestrictedCashAndCashEquivalentsAtCarryi.label: Restricted Cash and Cash Equivalents, Current
RestrictedCashAndCashEquivalentsAtCarryi.description: Amount of cash and cash equivalents restricted as to withdrawal or usage, classified as current. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, and other accounts with general characteristics of demand deposits. Cash equivalents include, but are not limited to, short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates.

Revenues.label: Revenues
Revenues.description: Amount of revenue recognized from goods sold, services rendered, insurance premiums, or other activities that constitute an earning process. Includes, but is not limited to, investment and interest income before deduction of interest expense when recognized as a component of revenue, and sales and trading gain (loss).

RoyaltyGuaranteesCommitmentsAmount.label: Royalty Guarantees, Commitments, Amount
RoyaltyGuaranteesCommitmentsAmount.description: The amount the entity has committed to make for future royalty guarantees.

SaleLeasebackTransactionNetBookValue.label: Sale Leaseback Transaction, Net Book Value
SaleLeasebackTransactionNetBookValue.description: The net book value of the asset(s) sold in connection with the sale of the property to another party and lease back to the seller.

SalesAndExciseTaxPayableCurrentAndNoncur.label: Sales and Excise Tax Payable
SalesAndExciseTaxPayableCurrentAndNoncur.description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of liabilities incurred through that date and payable for statutory sales and use taxes, including value added tax.

SalesRevenueNet.label: Revenue, Net (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
SalesRevenueNet.description: Total revenue from sale of goods and services rendered during the reporting period, in the normal course of business, reduced by sales returns and allowances, and sales discounts.

SellingGeneralAndAdministrativeExpense.label: Selling, General and Administrative Expense
SellingGeneralAndAdministrativeExpense.description: The aggregate total costs related to selling a firm's product and services, as well as all other general and administrative expenses. Direct selling expenses (for example, credit, warranty, and advertising) are expenses that can be directly linked to the sale of specific products. Indirect selling expenses are expenses that cannot be directly linked to the sale of specific products, for example telephone expenses, Internet, and postal charges. General and administrative expenses include salaries of non-sales personnel, rent, utilities, communication, etc.

ShareBasedCompensation.label: Share-based Payment Arrangement, Noncash Expense
ShareBasedCompensation.description: Amount of noncash expense for share-based payment arrangement.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Equity Instruments Other than Options, Grants in Period
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: The number of grants made during the period on other than stock (or unit) option plans (for example, phantom stock or unit plan, stock or unit appreciation rights plan, performance target plan).

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Equity Instruments Other than Options, Nonvested, Number
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: The number of non-vested equity-based payment instruments, excluding stock (or unit) options, that validly exist and are outstanding as of the balance sheet date.

SharesIssuedPricePerShare.label: Shares Issued, Price Per Share
SharesIssuedPricePerShare.description: Per share or per unit amount of equity securities issued.

StockIssued1.label: Stock Issued
StockIssued1.description: The fair value of stock issued in noncash financing activities.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesStockOption.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Exercises in Period
StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesStockOption.description: Number of share options (or share units) exercised during the current period.

TaxesPayableCurrent.label: Taxes Payable, Current
TaxesPayableCurrent.description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred and payable for statutory income, sales, use, payroll, excise, real, property and other taxes. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

TemporaryEquityCarryingAmountAttributabl.label: Temporary Equity, Carrying Amount, Attributable to Parent
TemporaryEquityCarryingAmountAttributabl.description: Carrying amount, attributable to parent, of an entity's issued and outstanding stock which is not included within permanent equity. Temporary equity is a security with redemption features that are outside the control of the issuer, is not classified as an asset or liability in conformity with GAAP, and is not mandatorily redeemable. Includes any type of security that is redeemable at a fixed or determinable price or on a fixed or determinable date or dates, is redeemable at the option of the holder, or has conditions for redemption which are not solely within the control of the issuer. Includes stock with a put option held by an ESOP and stock redeemable by a holder only in the event of a change in control of the issuer.

TemporaryEquityParOrStatedValuePerShare.label: Temporary Equity, Par or Stated Value Per Share
TemporaryEquityParOrStatedValuePerShare.description: Per share amount of par value or stated value of stock classified as temporary equity. Temporary equity is a security with redemption features that are outside the control of the issuer, is not classified as an asset or liability in conformity with GAAP, and is not mandatorily redeemable.

TemporaryEquitySharesIssued.label: Temporary Equity, Shares Issued
TemporaryEquitySharesIssued.description: The number of securities classified as temporary equity that have been sold (or granted) to the entity's shareholders. Securities issued include securities outstanding and securities held in treasury. Temporary equity is a security with redemption features that are outside the control of the issuer, is not classified as an asset or liability in conformity with GAAP, and is not mandatorily redeemable. Includes any type of security that is redeemable at a fixed or determinable price or on a fixed or determinable date or dates, is redeemable at the option of the holder, or has conditions for redemption which are not solely within the control of the issuer. If convertible, the issuer does not control the actions or events necessary to issue the maximum number of shares that could be required to be delivered under the conversion option if the holder exercises the option to convert the stock to another class of equity. If the security is a warrant or a rights issue, the warrant or rights issue is considered to be temporary equity if the issuer cannot demonstrate that it would be able to deliver upon the exercise of the option by the holder in all cases. Includes stock with put option held by ESOP and stock redeemable by holder only in the event of a change in control of the issuer.

TemporaryEquitySharesOutstanding.label: Temporary Equity, Shares Outstanding
TemporaryEquitySharesOutstanding.description: The number of securities classified as temporary equity that have been issued and are held by the entity's shareholders. Securities outstanding equals securities issued minus securities held in treasury. Temporary equity is a security with redemption features that are outside the control of the issuer, is not classified as an asset or liability in conformity with GAAP, and is not mandatorily redeemable. Includes any type of security that is redeemable at a fixed or determinable price or on a fixed or determinable date or dates, is redeemable at the option of the holder, or has conditions for redemption which are not solely within the control of the issuer. If convertible, the issuer does not control the actions or events necessary to issue the maximum number of shares that could be required to be delivered under the conversion option if the holder exercises the option to convert the stock to another class of equity. If the security is a warrant or a rights issue, the warrant or rights issue is considered to be temporary equity if the issuer cannot demonstrate that it would be able to deliver upon the exercise of the option by the holder in all cases. Includes stock with put option held by ESOP and stock redeemable by holder only in the event of a change in control of the issuer.

TemporaryEquityStockIssuedDuringPeriodVa.label: Temporary Equity, Stock Issued During Period, Value, New Issues
TemporaryEquityStockIssuedDuringPeriodVa.description: Value of new stock classified as temporary equity issued during the period.

UnrealizedGainLossOnDerivatives.label: Unrealized Gain (Loss) on Derivatives
UnrealizedGainLossOnDerivatives.description: The net change in the difference between the fair value and the carrying value, or in the comparative fair values, of derivative instruments, including options, swaps, futures, and forward contracts, held at each balance sheet date, that was included in earnings for the period.

WarrantsAndRightsOutstanding.label: Warrants and Rights Outstanding
WarrantsAndRightsOutstanding.description: Value of outstanding derivative securities that permit the holder the right to purchase securities (usually equity) from the issuer at a specified price.

WeightedAverageLimitedPartnershipUnitsOu.label: Weighted Average Limited Partnership Units Outstanding, Basic
WeightedAverageLimitedPartnershipUnitsOu.description: Weighted average number of limited partnership units outstanding determined by relating the portion of time within a reporting period that limited partnership units have been outstanding to the total time in that period.

WeightedAverageLimitedPartnershipUnitsOu.label: Weighted Average Limited Partnership Units Outstanding, Diluted
WeightedAverageLimitedPartnershipUnitsOu.description: Weighted average number of limited partnership units outstanding determined by relating the portion of time within a reporting period that limited partnership units have been outstanding to the total time in that period. Used in the calculation of diluted net income or loss per limited partnership unit.

WeightedAverageNumberOfDilutedSharesOuts.label: Weighted Average Number of Shares Outstanding, Diluted
WeightedAverageNumberOfDilutedSharesOuts.description: The average number of shares or units issued and outstanding that are used in calculating diluted EPS or earnings per unit (EPU), determined based on the timing of issuance of shares or units in the period.

WeightedAverageNumberOfShareOutstandingB.label: Weighted Average Number of Shares Outstanding, Basic and Diluted
WeightedAverageNumberOfShareOutstandingB.description: Average number of shares or units issued and outstanding that are used in calculating basic and diluted earnings per share (EPS).

WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesOutstanding.label: Weighted Average Number of Shares Outstanding, Basic
WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesOutstanding.description: Number of [basic] shares or units, after adjustment for contingently issuable shares or units and other shares or units not deemed outstanding, determined by relating the portion of time within a reporting period that common shares or units have been outstanding to the total time in that period.

WeightedAverageNumerDilutedLimitedPartne.label: Weighted Average Number Diluted Limited Partnership Units Outstanding Adjustment
WeightedAverageNumerDilutedLimitedPartne.description: The sum of dilutive potential limited partnership units used in the calculation of the diluted per-unit computation.

WriteOffOfDeferredDebtIssuanceCost.label: Write off of Deferred Debt Issuance Cost
WriteOffOfDeferredDebtIssuanceCost.description: Write-off of amounts previously capitalized as debt issuance cost in an extinguishment of debt.
